data.caption: Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Period Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
Financial Results for period ended 31.03.2023 The Board has approved at its meeting held today: 1. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for period ended 31.03.2023. Enclosed copy of Auditors' Report and Press release being issued in this connection.
2. The Board has recommended dividend @ Rs. 7.20 per equity share on FV Rs. 5 each (i.e. 144% of paid-up equity share capital), for the FY 2022-23, subject to the approval of the shareholders at the ensuing 51st AGM. The dividend would be paid within 30 days from the date of its declaration at the AGM.
3. Record date as Friday, 08.09.2023, for taking record of members for payment of dividend. Enclosed Disclosures of RPT on a consolidated basis, for the HFY 31.03.2023.

data.caption: Regulation 23(9) - Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions On Consolidated Basis
data.news_body: 1.Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for year ended 31.3.2022 & Auditors'' Report approved by the Board at its meeting held today is enclosed. Press release being issued in this connection is attached. The joint statutory auditors have issued audit reports with modified opinion & Statement on Impact Qualifications is submitted. 2. Board approved declaration of interim dividend @ Rs. 2.25 per equity share (s.t. deduction of TDS) on FV of Rs. 5 each for the FY 21-22. 3. Board approved Record date as 8.6.2022, for ascertaining eligibility of shareholders for payment of interim dividend for FY 21-22. 4. Said interim dividend shall be dispatched to those shareholders in statement of beneficial owners on 8.6.2022 for shares in electronic form & members in Register on 8.6.2022 for physical shares. Aforesaid interim dividend shall be paid/ dispatched on or before 25.6.2022. 5. Disclosures of RPT on consolidated basis, for the half year ended 31. 3.2022 is enclosed.

data.news_body: 1. Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for year ended 31.3.2022 & Auditors'' Report approved by the Board at its meeting held today is enclosed. Press release being issued in this connection is attached. The joint statutory auditors have issued audit reports with modified opinion & Statement on Impact Qualifications is submitted. 2. Board approved declaration of interim dividend @ Rs. 2.25 per equity share (s.t. deduction of TDS) on FV of Rs. 5 each for the FY 21-22. 3. Board approved Record date as 08.06.2022, for ascertaining eligibility of shareholders for payment of interim dividend for FY 21-22. 4. Said interim dividend shall be dispatched to those shareholders in statement of beneficial owners on 08.06.2022 for shares in electronic form & members in Register on 08.06.2022 for physical shares. Aforesaid interim dividend shall be paid/dispatched on or before 25.6.2022. 5. Disclosures of RPT on consolidated basis for the half year ended 31.3.2022 is enclosed.

data.caption: Rectified Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter /Period Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
This has reference to our communication dated 10th November 2021 (GIC Re/SE/2021-22/Q2-OBM) regarding Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter/period ended September 30, 2021.
In this regard, we would like to inform that inadvertent typographical error occurred in serial no. 13 of Annexure I (Underwriting Profit/Loss for the three months ending September, 2021) of the Unaudited Standalone Financial
Results and the same has been rectified in the revised version as uploaded herewith.
Further it is hereby informed that the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) remain unchanged except for the aforesaid Annexure I (SL No. 13) and there are no changes in the other Annexures/Statements.
Kindly take the above information on record.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter And Year Ended March 31,2021
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and other applicable requirements, we forward herewith a copy of the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021 together with the Auditors'' Report as approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also attached.

Please note that J Singh & Associates and D R Mohnot & Co. Chartered Accountants, the joint statutory auditors of the Corporation have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion.

2. The Board of Directors of the Corporation have not recommended payment of Dividend for the FY 2020-21.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 29Th June 2021
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and other applicable requirements, we forward herewith a copy of the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021 together with the Auditors'' Report as approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also attached.

Please note that J Singh & Associates and D R Mohnot & Co. Chartered Accountants, the joint statutory auditors of the Corporation have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion.

2. The Board of Directors of the Corporation have not recommended payment of Dividend for the FY 2020-21.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith Investor Presentation - 03 FY 2020-21 Financial Results Presentation.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Clarification For Financial Results: Re-Submission Of Financial Results For Quarter Ended 31.12.2020
data.news_body:
This is with reference to NSE's email dated 17th February 2021, wherein the Exchange has sought clarification on quick results submitted by the Corporation for quarter ended 31st December 2020 on the below mentioned points:
1. Financial results not signed by authorized signatory/ies
2. Machine Readable Form / Legible copy of Financial Results not submitted
The Corporation clarifies as under:
The Board in its meeting held on 11th February, 2021 had approved unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2020 together with the Auditors' Limited Review Report. A copy of the same alongwith press release was submitted.
However, as required vide the above mentioned mail, we are resubmitting the legible copy of unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2020 together with the Auditors' Limited Review Report and Press Release.
Further, it is hereby clarified that the unaudited financial results are not revised but are only resubmitted.
